TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, You wish that you where a caterpillar.

I wish that I am rigged to explode the next time I post in this thread .

Edited June 8, 2013 by Mach56

granted you explode into a caterpillar

i wish that everything was closer

Granted. I'm now MUCH closer to you...muhahahahaha.

I wish people would get their mind out if the gutter.

Granted. It instead gets picked up by a bowling machine, where it promptly gets removed and sent down the chute back to the bowlers. Of course this makes a huge mess of the equipment, and everyone gets mad cause the bowling alley has to shut down for cleanup.

I wish I could afford to go bowling today.

Granted. you use the money for something other than bowling.

I wish for time.

Granted, you now experience 1 second for the rest of us as 1 year for you. You now live for about 80 seconds by our time.

I wish for more madness in the world. Its FUN!

Granted. I come over to the U.K. and cause chaos and madness.

I wish that I wouldn't be shot on sight of I were to go to australia.

Granted, you are now bludgeoned to death with a giant inflatable toy kangaroo on sight if you were to go to Australia.

I wish that I had a shrink ray.

Granted, you have a dead, shrunken manta ray.

I wish I could download more RAM.

Granted, you can only download -4GB of ram now.

I wish for even more madness!

(You get shot in Australia Rage?)

Granted. You are now more and more anger at all your friends.

I wish I had my pilots license already.

Granted, it is only for a non-existing aeroplane.

I wish my mouse would work or have a new one. You can't do KSP on a laptops mousepad. You need scroll for building the rockets.

Granted, but now KSP requires a trackpad for moving the cursor.

I wish that I had a bear of the Tu-95 variety.

Granted, but your KSP runway needs a extension, since the Tu-95Bear turned into a Tu-160BlackjackBear...

I wish my birthday wasn't at the end of June...

Granted, It's at the start of July

I wish to be standing under a rocket when said rocket lifts off.

Granted ,but it doesn't lift off.

I wish that the mainsail initiative had more nations in BLOC.

(this-->http://www.bloc.name/bloc/news.php)

Granted, but the site now BLOCs all of its users. (I was too lazy to read that much into it )

I wish that the Soviet Union still existed.

Granted. They are planning to nuke us.

I wish for Steam to not be a broken thing.

Granted, but now computers run on actual steam.

I wish that jet engines worked in space.

Granted you broke physics meaning the universe is even more broken.

I wish the extensive damage to the universe was fixed.

Granted. Just when I finally am putting the final touches on restoring it, somebody invents Time travel and inflicts irrepairable damage to the space-time continnum.

I wish I could fly.

granted ,but since the universe is still damage your wish doesn't work

I wish the universe is fixed with out interruptions.

Granted, but now there is no interuptions for anything, causing all of the universe's history to happen at once, breaking it again along with time itself this time.

I wish for a soopersunic jet, NOT a supersonic one. I can see where you might be confused though, they are pretty similar

Granted. You're hit by a jet stream made of soup as hot as the sun.

I wish for superpowers.

Granted,but once you get them they don't seem so super anymore

I wish for bobcat to release his ares v/Altair update for the American pack already.
